src:
鎮江骨 酸酸甜甜好下飯（視頻）

01 Nov 2019, 02:49

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月01日訊】鎮江骨
材料 Ingredients八百克腩排 800g Spare ribs
醃料 Marinade兩湯匙生抽 2tbsp Soy sauce兩湯匙紹興酒 2tbsp Shaoxing wine/ Dry sherry兩茶匙生粉 2tsp Potato flour
調味料 Condiments一百二十毫升鎮江醋 120g Chinkiang vinegar兩片月桂葉 2 Bay leaves兩粒八角 2 Star anise一湯匙生抽 1tbsp Soy sauce一茶匙幼鹽 1tsp Table salt七十克冰糖 70g Rock sugar半茶匙黑椒碎 1/2 tsp ground pepper六粒蒜頭 6 cloves of Garlic兩片薑 2 slices of Ginger五粒紅蔥頭 5 Shallots半隻紅甜椒/指天椒 1/2 Sweet chilli/ bird’s eye chilli六百毫升清水 600ml Water半茶匙麻油 1/2tsp Sesame oil
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102697860.html
text:
Zhenjiang bone, sweet and sour, good meal (video)

01 Nov 2019, 02:49

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 01, 2019] Zhenjiang bone
Ingredients 800g 腩 800g Spare ribs
Marinade Marinade two tablespoons soy sauce 2tbsp Soy sauce two tablespoons Shaoxing wine 2tbsp Shaoxing wine/ Dry sherry two teaspoons raw flour 2tsp Potato flour
Seasoning Condiments 120 ml Zhenjiang vinegar 120g Chinkiang vinegar two bay leaves 2 Bay leaves two octagonal 2 Star anise one tablespoon soy sauce 1tbsp Soy sauce one teaspoon young salt 1tsp Table salt seventy grams of rock sugar 70g Rock sugar half teaspoon black Pepper 1/2 tsp ground pepper six garlic 6 cloves of Garlic two slices of ginger 2 slices of Ginger five red onion head 5 Shallots half red bell pepper / tiantian pepper 1/2 Sweet chilli / bird's eye chilli six hundred milliliters of water 600ml Water half teaspoon sesame oil 1/2tsp Sesame oil
The following YouTube video demo:



(Editor: Zhang Xinyan) This article URL: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/01/a102697860.html
